title: Default branch does not compile: `GZ_ASSERT` was not declared for MeshCSG

content.raw:
When compiling from default branch
~~~
$ hg sum
parent: 12752:c809e3e4daa1 
 Merged in image_view_improvements (pull request #921)
branch: default
commit: 5 unknown (clean)
update: (current)
mq:     (empty queue)
~~~

I get this error:
~~~
[ 15%] Building CXX object gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/MeshCSG.cc.o
cd /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/build_release/gazebo/common && /usr/bin/c++   -Dgazebo_common_EXPORTS -DLIBBULLET_VERSION=2.82 -s -O3 -DNDEBUG -msse4.2 -msse4.1 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic  -s -O3 -DNDEBUG -msse4.2 -msse4.1 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -fPIC -I/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/test/gtest/include -I/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api -I/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/build_release -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/RTShaderSystem -isystem /usr/include/OGRE -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/Terrain -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/Paging -isystem /home/hsu/local/include/sdformat-1.4 -I/usr/include/glib-2.0 -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/glib-2.0/include    -fPIC -pthread -I/usr/include/glib-2.0 -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/glib-2.0/include -o CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/MeshCSG.cc.o -c /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/gazebo/common/MeshCSG.cc
/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/gazebo/common/MeshCSG.cc: In member function ‘gazebo::common::Mesh* gazebo::common::MeshCSG::CreateBoolean(const gazebo::common::Mesh*, const gazebo::common::Mesh*, int, const gazebo::math::Pose&)’:
/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/gazebo/common/MeshCSG.cc:197:47: error: ‘GZ_ASSERT’ was not declared in this scope
make[2]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/MeshCSG.cc.o] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/build_release'
make[1]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: Leaving directory `/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/build_release'
make: *** [all] Error 2
~~~
content.html:
When compiling from default branch

$ hg sum
parent: 12752:c809e3e4daa1 
 Merged in image_view_improvements (pull request #921)
branch: default
commit: 5 unknown (clean)
update: (current)
mq:     (empty queue)

I get this error:

[ 15%] Building CXX object gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/MeshCSG.cc.o
cd /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/build_release/gazebo/common && /usr/bin/c++   -Dgazebo_common_EXPORTS -DLIBBULLET_VERSION=2.82 -s -O3 -DNDEBUG -msse4.2 -msse4.1 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic  -s -O3 -DNDEBUG -msse4.2 -msse4.1 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -fPIC -I/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/test/gtest/include -I/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api -I/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/build_release -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/RTShaderSystem -isystem /usr/include/OGRE -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/Terrain -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/Paging -isystem /home/hsu/local/include/sdformat-1.4 -I/usr/include/glib-2.0 -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/glib-2.0/include    -fPIC -pthread -I/usr/include/glib-2.0 -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/glib-2.0/include -o CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/MeshCSG.cc.o -c /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/gazebo/common/MeshCSG.cc
/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/gazebo/common/MeshCSG.cc: In member function ‘gazebo::common::Mesh* gazebo::common::MeshCSG::CreateBoolean(const gazebo::common::Mesh*, const gazebo::common::Mesh*, int, const gazebo::math::Pose&)’:
/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/gazebo/common/MeshCSG.cc:197:47: error: ‘GZ_ASSERT’ was not declared in this scope
make[2]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/MeshCSG.cc.o] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/build_release'
make[1]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: Leaving directory `/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_physics_api/build_release'
make: *** [all] Error 2
